introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use the PR1AS platform.
introduction.content2: By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information as described in this policy.

providedInfo.title: 2.1. Information You Provide
providedInfo.description: When registering an account or using services, we may collect:

items.personal: Personal information: Name, email, phone number, date of birth
items.payment: Payment information: Credit card information, bank account
items.address: Address information: Home address, geographic location

autoInfo.title: 2.2. Automatically Collected Information
autoInfo.description: When you use our services, we automatically collect:

items.device: Device information: Device type, operating system, browser
items.usage: Usage information: Pages you visit, access time, IP address
items.cookies: Cookies and similar technologies: To improve user experience

informationUse.title: 3. How We Use Information
informationUse.description: We use the collected information to:

items.provide: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.process: Process transactions and send related notifications
items.marketing: Send marketing information and service updates (with your consent)
items.detect: Detect, prevent, and resolve technical issues or fraud
items.comply: Comply with legal obligations and protect user rights

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We only share information in the following cases:

items.users: With other users: Some public information (such as name, avatar) may be displayed to other users when you interact on the platform
items.providers: Service providers: We may share information with service partners (such as payment, storage) to support platform operations
items.legal: Legal requirements: When required by law enforcement or to protect our and users' rights
items.business: Business transfer: In case of merger, acquisition, or asset sale, information may be transferred

security.title: 5. Information Security
security.description: We apply appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss, or alteration:

items.encryption: Encrypt sensitive data during transmission and storage
items.access: Strict access control and user authentication

security.disclaimer: However, no method of electronic transmission or storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights

items.access: Access: Request to view personal information we store about you
items.edit: Edit: Update or modify your personal information
items.delete: Delete: Request deletion of your personal information (unless law requires us to retain it)
items.optout: Opt-out: Refuse to receive marketing information or withdraw consent
items.portability: Data portability: Request transfer of your data to another service

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at: privacy@pr1as.com

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.description: Our services are not intended for children under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If we discover that we have collected information from children, we will delete that information immediately.

changes.title: 9. Policy Changes
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting a notice on the website or sending an email. Your continued use of the service after changes take effect is considered acceptance of the new policy.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.description: If you have questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing and using the PR1AS platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions of use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you are not permitted to use the service.
acceptance.content2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the service after changes is considered acceptance of the new terms.

items.platform: "Platform" or "Service": Refers to the PR1AS platform and all features, services, and tools provided through the platform.
items.company: "We", "Company", or "PR1AS": Refers to the company that owns and operates the platform.
items.user: "You" or "User": Refers to any individual or organization that accesses and uses the service.
items.client: "Client": Users who seek and use services from Workers.
items.worker: "Worker": Users who provide services to Clients.

requirements.title: 3.1. Registration Requirements
requirements.description: To use some features of the service, you need to register an account. When registering, you agree to:

items.accurate: Provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information
items.maintain: Maintain and update your account information
items.security: Secure your password and login information
items.responsibility: Be responsible for all activities under your account
items.notify: Notify us immediately of any security breaches

eligibility.title: 3.2. Eligibility
eligibility.description: You must be at least 18 years old and have legal capacity to enter into contracts. By using the service, you confirm that you meet these requirements.

rights.title: 4.1. Usage Rights
rights.description: We grant you a non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable right to use the service, subject to these terms.

items.illegal: Use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
items.violate: Violate any applicable laws, regulations, or rules
items.infringe: Infringe on intellectual property, privacy, or other rights of others
items.content: Post, transmit, or share content that is infringing, fraudulent, threatening, harassing, or discriminatory
items.spam: Use the service to send spam, junk mail, or unwanted information
items.access: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems, accounts, or networks
items.automation: Use robots, spiders, or other automated tools to access the service
items.copy: Copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works from the service without permission

worker.title: 5.1. Worker
worker.description: If you register as a Worker, you agree to:

items.accurate: Provide accurate information about your services, skills, and experience
items.professional: Provide services professionally and as described
items.comply: Comply with all laws and regulations related to service provision
items.tax: Be responsible for taxes and other legal obligations related to service income
items.illegal: Not use the service to conduct illegal or inappropriate activities

client.title: 5.2. Client
client.description: If you use the service as a Client, you agree to:

items.payment: Pay fully and on time for ordered services
items.respect: Treat Workers with respect and professionalism
items.accurate: Provide accurate information about your service requirements
items.illegal: Not request Workers to perform illegal or inappropriate activities

payment.title: 6. Payment and Fees
payment.description: Some services on the platform may require payment. You agree to:

items.pay: Pay all fees and costs related to service use
items.accurate: Provide accurate and valid payment information
items.fees: We may charge service fees or commissions for transactions made through the platform
items.refund: All payments are non-refundable unless otherwise stated in our refund policy

intellectual.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content1: All content, features, and functions of the service, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, software, and source code, are owned by us or licensed to us and protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual.content2: You may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or rent any part of the service without our written permission.

ownership.title: 8.1. Ownership
ownership.description: You retain ownership of content you post on the platform. However, by posting content, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, free, and transferable right to use, copy, modify, and display that content on the platform.

responsibility.title: 8.2. Content Responsibility
responsibility.description: You are fully responsible for content you post. You ensure that your content:

items.rights: Does not infringe on any third party's rights
items.laws: Does not violate any laws or regulations
items.misleading: Does not contain misleading or fraudulent information
items.offensive: Does not contain offensive, threatening, or harassing content

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: The service is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not guarantee that:

items.uninterrupted: The service will always operate uninterrupted or error-free
items.errors: Errors will be corrected or the service will meet your specific requirements
items.viruses: The service or servers providing the service are free of viruses or malicious components

disclaimer.liability: We are not responsible for any damages arising from the use or inability to use the service, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.

limitation.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any damages, including but not limited to:

items.profits: Loss of profits, revenue, or data
items.use: Damages arising from the use or inability to use the service

indemnification.title: 11. Indemnification
indemnification.description: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold us, our affiliates, employees, agents, and partners harmless from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, costs, or expenses (including reasonable attorney fees) arising from or related to:

items.rights: Infringement of any third party's rights

termination.title: 12. Termination
termination.content1: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including but not limited to violation of these terms.
termination.content2: Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease and we may delete or disable your account and content.

governing.title: 13. Governing Law
governing.description: These terms are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Vietnam. Any disputes arising from or related to these terms will be resolved in the competent courts of Vietnam.

contact.title: 14. Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about these terms, please contact us:
